Key Match Events: India defeated Bangladesh by 5 runs in the T20I World Cup match on 2 November 2022.
Virat Kohli scored 64 runs off 44 balls.
KL Rahul scored 50 runs off 32 balls.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 30 runs off 16 balls.
Hasan Mahmud took 3 wickets for 47 runs.
Shakib Al Hasan took 2 wickets for 33 runs.
Litton Das scored 60 runs off 27 balls.
Arshdeep Singh and Hardik Pandya each took 2 wickets.
Rain interrupted the match, leading to a revised target for Bangladesh.
Post-Match Reflections: Virender Sehwag complimented Indian bowlers on their comeback.
Mohammad Shami praised the team's character for the win.
KL Rahul reacted positively after his performance.
Surya Kumar Yadav expressed gratitude for becoming the world's number one batsman in T20 cricket.
Dinesh Karthik described the game as having an exhilarating atmosphere.
Sachin Tendulkar congratulated Team India on their win.
Virat Kohli reacted to the win against Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain affected the match, reducing Bangladesh's target to 151 in 16 overs from 185 in 20 overs.
